name: USD Coin
quickSteps: Open the canonical USDC coin page.
Pick your working rails (Ethereum, Tron, Solana) matching fee and tooling needs.
Set wallet hygiene: update, back up seed offline, label a dedicated USDC account.
Fund and test basic flows (optional for large amounts) to confirm fees and latency.
Plan exits and conversions (fiat ramps or USDC→XMR for private settlement).

seo.title: USDC (USD Coin) — Design, Reserves, Risks & Uses
seo.description: How USDC works across networks, reserves and attestations, key risks, security model, and everyday uses.
